name: Racoon Lagoon
storyline: Hello, Island Spirit! A group of adorable sailors have been marooned on your shore. Let’s help them build a home here. And just maybe, they can help us repair the island’s broken heart. Explore the eight beautiful and distinct climates of the island, and with fishing, cooking, farming, mining, painting, themed decorations, and many hours of story quests, you won’t run out of things to do. You can invite a friend if you wish, just make sure to watch out for the Raccoons!
summary: Play as an island spirit and help out the adorable sailors that are marooned on your island! Fish, mine, farm, decorate, and more, as you restore the island to its former glory and build a new welcoming home for your new residents.
